identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a clean, modern SaaS gamification platform that balances professional utility with playful player engagement.

headings.usage: All dashboard headings, landing page titles, and major component headers.

body.usage: General text, form inputs, table data, and descriptions.

display.usage: Wheel segments, prize titles, and 'Spin to Win' call-to-actions.

mono.usage: API keys, redeem codes, and audit logs.

primary.description: Electric Indigo. Used for primary actions, active states, and brand identity.

secondary.description: Vibrant Emerald. Used for 'Win' states, success messages, and positive trends.

accent.description: Pale Violet. Used for gamification highlights and subtle decorative elements.

dashboard.structure: Sidebar + Top Header + Main Content Area
rules: Sidebar must be collapsible on mobile.
Top header contains breadcrumbs and user profile only.
Main content uses a max-width container (max-w-7xl) centered.
Wheel must be perfectly centered vertically and horizontally on mobile.
Controls (Spin Button) must be in the 'Thumb Zone' (bottom 30% of screen).
Result modals must be bottom sheets on mobile, dialogs on desktop.

wheel_of_fortune.styling: Segments alternate between Primary and Accent colors. Text is perpendicular to center.

stats_card.customization: Remove default border if using 'bg-card'. Add 'trend' indicator (green up arrow, red down arrow).

player_excited.usage: Player interface success state or landing page social proof

accessibility: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.
Wheel segments must have distinct borders or contrasting colors for colorblindness.
All interactive elements must be focusable via keyboard.
motion: Disable heavy animations if 'prefers-reduced-motion' is set.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Wheel' component using pure React state and CSS transforms or a lightweight library if necessary, but avoid heavy game engines.
Strictly follow the color palette. Do not introduce new colors without reason.
For the 'Consent Registry', use a clean, non-intrusive bottom banner.
Ensure all 'data-testid' attributes are present for testing.
